comments.body: if you want you can also use `newLoggingContext` after the `in` method when defining tests. Whatever you feel makes more sense.
I'll leave it here for now but I'll consider it when this gets refactored into `ParticipantStateIntegrationSpecBase`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@
  private def start(id: String): Resource[KeyValueParticipantState] = {
    newLoggingContext { implicit logCtx =>
      val ledgerId: LedgerString = LedgerString.assertFromString(s"ledger-${UUID.randomUUID()}")
      val participantId: ParticipantId = LedgerString.assertFromString("participant")
